solution_line_template: Gunther can type {total_working_minutes_per_day} / {minutes_per_set} = <<{total_working_minutes_per_day}/{minutes_per_set}={sets_of_words_per_day}>>{sets_of_words_per_day} sets of 160 words per 3 minutes.
Therefore, he can type {words_per_set} x {sets_of_words_per_day} = <<{words_per_set}*{sets_of_words_per_day}={total_words_per_day}>>{total_words_per_day} words per day.
